column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We went on a Thursday night around 8 pm.  The wait was ~40 minutes
column2: so we pre-ordered when we placed our names.  The staff said it takes ~30 minutes for the pizza to bake.  So
column4: hey that's perfect - we'll pre-order now and when our table is ready
column6: too.  We were seated in 40 minutes
column7: but our pizza was nowhere in sight.  We waited another 30 minutes or so until our pizza actually arrived.  I guess they were pretty busy.
